welcome_page.title: Evaluate customer loan applications with precision
welcome_page.description: Get instant insights into approval factors and explore counterfactuals to offer customers alternative scenarios!

learn_more_page.title: What does CLEAR do for your bank?
learn_more_page.description_1: Processing loan applications efficiently while providing clear explanations to customers is crucial for your business. That's why we are here to support your operations.
learn_more_page.description_2: Our platform gives you detailed analysis of why a customer's loan application was approved or rejected, and shows alternative scenarios you can propose to help customers qualify – like suggesting a smaller amount, improving their credit profile, or adjusting loan terms.
learn_more_page.description_3: The best part: You can lock certain customer attributes that cannot be changed, like their current income, and our system will focus on realistic alternatives that the customer can actually implement.
learn_more_page.description_4: We make it easy for you to understand approval factors and provide actionable advice to your customers, enhancing their experience and your loan portfolio.

form_page.form_description:
Enter customer details below to assess their loan application and explore alternative scenarios.
Use the lock icons to fix any details that cannot be changed.

your_application_page.form_description: Enter customer details below to assess their loan application and explore alternative scenarios. Use the lock icons to fix any details that cannot be changed.

dashboard.UMAP_info_description:
This dynamic visualization reveals how the customer's loan application compares to others in your portfolio.

The gray rectangles are Magnets. Drag them around the canvas to pull similar applications towards them.
dashboard.UMAP_info_item_1: The current customer application is the <red>Red Dot ●</red>.
dashboard.UMAP_info_item_2: <blue>Blue Dots ●</blue> are alternative scenarios . If a dot moves towards a magnet (e.g., 'Age'), it means it has a high value for that feature.
dashboard.UMAP_info_item_3: Click on any dot to select it. It will turn <green>Green ●</green> and update the detailed charts below.
dashboard.UMAP_info_item_4: Use the checkboxes on the left to <bold>add or remove</bold> magnets to focus on different criteria.
dashboard.UMAP_info_item_5: Hold SHIFT while draging a Magnet to change its <bold>magnetic force</bold>. Use the MOUSEWHEEL or zoom bar to change the <bold>zoom level.</bold>.
dashboard.UMAP_info_footer: Explore the scenarios to find the best options to propose to your customer!
dashboard.probability_bar_info_description: This bar helps you assess the <important>customer's chances of loan approval</important> at a glance.
dashboard.probability_bar_info_item_1: The color gradient goes from <low>red (low probability)</low> on the left to <high>green (high probability)</high> on the right.
dashboard.probability_bar_info_item_2: The <user>current marker ▲</user> shows the probability based on the customer's original application.
dashboard.probability_bar_info_item_3: When you select an alternative scenario, a <chosen>second marker ▲</chosen> will appear, showing how the probability changes with the suggested adjustments.

about_page.title: Empowering your bank to serve customers better!
about_page.description_1: CLEAR provides your loan officers with instant, data-driven insights into loan application outcomes and alternative scenarios for customers.
about_page.description_2: Based on the model provided by your bank, key factors are analyzed to explain approval decisions and identify actionable improvements.
about_page.description_3: CLEAR helps your team provide better customer service through transparent explanations and practical alternatives. No more guesswork—just clear answers for both you and your customers.

privacy_page.privacy_title: Customer data security is our priority!
privacy_page.description: At Clear, protecting your customers' privacy is our top priority. We use customer data only for loan assessment calculations and store it only as long as absolutely necessary for your banking operations. No tracking, no unnecessary storage—just secure, transparent insights to help you serve your customers better with confidence.
privacy_page.footer_description: Visit our privacy policy for more details about how we approach data privacy in banking.

get_assistance_page.title: Do you need support?
get_assistance_page.message_placeholder: How can we assist you with the CLEAR platform? Please provide as much detail as possible.
